Setting up Home Assistant Follow instructions in our docs page to configure and install Home Assistant here â†’ Install and Configure AccuWeather Integration Go to the AccuWeather website â†’ and create an account. Login to your AccuWeather account and go to MyApps tab and create a new app. Once the app is created, click on it to find your API Key.
